source_reference.text: How a Christian Wife Can Love Her Husband According to the Bible (4 Tips) (Video by ApplyGodsWord.com/Mark Ballenger)

content_summary:
What does the Bible say about a Christian wife loving her husband? What does a husband need that only his Christian wife can bless him with? Here are 4 Christian marriage tips of advice for a wife who wants to love her husband well according to the Bible: 

1. A Christian Wife Shows Her Love for Her Husband Through Respect
2. A Christian Wife Shows Her Love for Her Husband Through Her Support and Belief In Him
3. A Christian Wife Shows Her Love for Her Husband By Being Vulnerable with Him
4. If a Christian Wife Wants to Love Her Husband Well, She Must Offer Him Forgiveness and Grace for His Poor Leadership
